      • searchWord

        public int searchWord(java.lang.String word)
        Parameters:
        word - Receives the word which needs to be searched in the trie constructed.
        Returns:
        1 if the word is present in the Constructed Tree and 0 if it is absent

      • predict

        public java.lang.String[] predict(java.lang.String text)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        text - Receives the text for which Prediction should be made
        Returns:
        Array of Strings which are the top 12 predicted possible words based on rank
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If Input needs to be taken for manual debugging

      • sort

        public void sort()
        Sorts the Predicted words by Rank in Descending Order

      • predictTraversal

        public void predictTraversal(java.lang.String word,
                    int wordCount,
                    Dictionary.Node temp)
        Parameters:
        word - Receives the Word for which Prediction should be made
        wordCount - Depicts the number of words possible from the current Node
        temp - is the Current Node used to Traverse through the trie
